title_job: Install Containerized Open Source Apps on Azure Cloud
description:
We are seeking a skilled freelancer to assist us in installing two open-source applications that are dockerized on our Azure cloud service. The ideal candidate will provide guidance on the best Azure service to utilize and ensure proper security measures are in place. A strong understanding of Docker, Azure, and cloud security is essential. Please include your relevant experience in your application.

The specific applications are DocDokuPLM & Frepple, with repositories located on GitHub.  They both have Docker images available.
